summary: Software Engineer with 2+ years of experience building scalable full-stack applications.

bullets: Architected and implemented scalable full-stack applications using React, TypeScript, Node.js, Next.js, Express.js, and MySQL within Agile development cycles
Expanded an automated accessibility compliance auditing framework (WCAG 2.2), increasing rule coverage by 240% and achieving 95% remediation automation across 800K+ web pages
Collaborated with clients to define requirements and engineered a SharePoint website crawling feature, generating $120K in business revenue
Built and deployed a policy engine microservice for dynamic content governance, cutting manual moderation by 80% and supporting 10+ rule types
Implemented CMS integration support for WordPress, Drupal, and TYPO3 to enable automated accessibility, SEO, and performance scanning and remediation across diverse ecosystems
Integrated AWS services (S3, SQS, SES) to support high-availability systems, and optimized database performance by fine-tuning indexes and query structures, reducing response times by 30%
Built a full-stack task management system within the internal ERP platform using Java Spring Boot and PostgreSQL; supported task workflows for over 12,000 users accelerating report generation

Designed and deployed over 25 RESTful APIs using Spring MVC and Spring Data JPA to support core business operations, enabling seamless integration across internal services and reducing cross-team data request time by 60%

Enhanced search, sorting, and collection efficiency for vehicle data by architecting and implementing 14 full-stack features using Java, MySQL, Spring Boot, and GWT, significantly boosting overall system performance

Optimized data organization by setting up and deploying a feature that queries mutually inclusive data across multiple projects using Angular and Java, leading to more efficient data management for users

education.degree: Bachelor of Engineering Science in Software Engineering with Co-op

awards.title: Dean's Honor List
awards.description: Consistent academic excellence at Western University
